_header: Mother of mercy shield him from th’orrible fiend
_description: Probable epitaph of William Caxton: ‘Bring hym to lyff eternall that neuyr hath ynd’ — one couplet

Unknown.Transcription:
Moder of merci shyld hym from thorribul fyndAnd bryng hym to lyff
                    eternall that neuyr hath ynd
Unknown.Editions:
